title:

stainless stell and PP material; colors: blue, gray, pink; size: 17x4.5 cm;

Available in three stylish colors - blue, gray, and pink - this scraper is not only practical but also adds a pop of color to your kitchen. Measuring 17x4.5 cm, it is the perfect size for convenient use.
